trans-unit.source: Specifies that a settings provider should disable any logic that gets invoked when an application upgrade is detected.
trans-unit.target: 指定设置提供程序，应禁用时检测到应用程序升级获得调用的任何逻辑。

trans-unit.source: To create a fully featured application settings provider that supports application versioning, the provider must implement the <xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的功能完整的应用程序设置提供程序支持应用程序版本控制，该提供程序必须实现<xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider>接口。</xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider>

trans-unit.source: One of the members in this interface, the <xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider.Upgrade%2A> method, is called to notify the provider that a new version of the application has been installed.
trans-unit.target: 此接口中的成员之一<xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider.Upgrade%2A>调用方法，以通知提供程序已安装应用程序的新版本。</xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider.Upgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: In response, the provider is expected to perform an appropriate action, typically migrating past application settings.
trans-unit.target: 在响应中，此提供程序应执行适当的操作，通常迁移过去的应用程序设置。

trans-unit.source: The NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute informs the provider to suppress the upgrade logic associated with the current settings class.
trans-unit.target: NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute 通知要取消升级逻辑与当前的设置类相关联的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the previous version of this property group should not be migrated to the new installation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此属性组的以前版本的值不应迁移到新安装。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This attribute can only be applied to individual application settings properties.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此特性仅应用于单个应用程序设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute"></xref> class.
This is the compiler-supplied default constructor for the <xref:System.Configuration.NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 这是<xref:System.Configuration.NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute>类</xref:System.Configuration.NoSettingsVersionUpgradeAttribute>的编译器提供的默认构造函数
